snippet: In illustrating how witnesses have changed their stories, the lawyer for the former Penn State assistant football coach charged with being a serial pedophile is asking the jury to question their reliability.
abstract: Defense in the Jerry Sandusky sex abuse trial highlights inconsistent testimony from witnesses, asking the jury to question their reliability; accounts of abuse have been heart-wrenching, with the defense facing the awkward task of having to cross-examine witnesses who were still wiping tears from their eyes.
lead_paragraph: In illustrating how witnesses have changed their stories, the lawyer for the former Penn State assistant football coach charged with being a serial pedophile is asking the jury to question their reliability.

headline.seo: Defense Highlights Inconsistent Witness Testimony at Sandusky Trial
headline.main: Defense Highlights Inconsistent Witness Testimony at Sandusky Trial
headline.print_headline: Defense Highlights Inconsistent Witness Testimony at Sandusky Trial
